author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Delete HA resources (QueueReplicator) along with the queues.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Clean up HA log messages.
- Reduce verbosity, drop unknown event messages.
- Fix minor test bug in ha_tests.py.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Added backup connection identifier to logging output.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Fix race condition in setting initial position of ReplicatingSubscription.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Use position events to synchronize queue positions between primary and backup
Previous code used dequeues to synchronize queue, but dequeue events
are generated in a different thread to message delivery which led to
race conditions. Position events are generated in-line with message
